about_the_game:
Feel the warmth of the sun, the cool breeze of the sea, and the excitement of new conquests in this ultimate summer paradise of San Rafaela, a vast new map full of new challenges and opportunities.

Expand your empire, unlock the true potential of this land, and seize the opportunity to leave an unforgettable mark on the fertile lands of San Rafaela.


  • Ferry routes for fast long-distance transportation of goods.
  • Story including familiar and new characters, plus rewards for completion!
  • 12 regions to explore and vast territories to conquer.
  • Dedicated areas for all Special buildings.
  • Unique landmarks, both natural and man-made.
  • New city designs and layouts.
  • 4 new lieutenants to unlock.
  • 5 new tracks with a hot summer vibe.


San Rafaela introduces a new logistics system - Ferry routes. Navigate through a river system via Ferry piers and take advantage of this new transportation method to maximize your smuggling operations and outwit your enemies.


San Rafaela is not just a new map; it has a brand-new campaign featuring both old and new characters! As well as new Global unlocks for completion. Can you navigate the perilous waters of power, betrayal, and survival? Step into San Rafaela and let your choices shape the fate of your cartel empire in this enthralling new storyline.


Discover the beauty of the San Rafaela landscapes - vast deserts, lush coastal forests, dormant volcanoes, picturesque coastlines, and other natural landmarks. The perfect backdrop for your thriving operations.


San Rafaela is a vast playground that surpasses the scale of the original map, granting you even more space to shape your criminal empire.

The destiny of San Rafaela lies in your hands!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and up
  • Processor: i5 and up
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 ~3 Ghz / Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

short_description: San Rafaela is a vast new map featuring ferry routes, stunning landmarks, and an immersive storyline! The destiny of San Rafaela lies in your hands!
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
